abstract: The amount gives Mitt Romney what is expected to be the second largest third-quarter haul in the Republican field, behind Gov. Rick Perry of Texas
snippet: The amount gives Mitt Romney what is expected to be the second largest third-quarter haul in the Republican field, behind Gov. Rick Perry of Texas
lead_paragraph: 4:09 p.m. | Updated Mitt Romney, the former Massachusetts governor, raised just over $14 million for his presidential bid during the three months ending Sept. 30, according to campaign filings delivered to the Federal Election Commission on Friday morning.
